descriptionHtml:
-First mod-
This addition adds a new room new room to Breezehome. Not only is there a new room, but I also put many ways to say 'thank you for downloading my mod" into the house as well.
--Apologies--
If you've lot anything in any new container, I am sorry.
I am sorry if I go really slow when I am working. I am still on it.
------
NOTICES:
** I deleted the 4th add-on to this mod. I will make it soon. the old V4 had a lot of problems with AI.
** Screw it, I am
** THE STRONGBOX DOES RESPAWN!!! I am so sorry if you've lost anything. Next update, I will repay you for what yo have lost.
----
Contents:
* 1 room above the enter / exit door.
* 1 new safe (thank you gift).
* 4-6 large gold purses (thank you gift).
* Added more food on the kitchen table (I thought about you Frostfall players).
* Strongbox that is surrounded by large gold purses, the the end table closest to the new room.
----
Changes / Organize changes
* The bed has been moves 90 degrees to the right, closest to Lydia's table
* The chest was moved at the end of the bed
* The end tables are surrounding (left & right) of the chest at the end of the bed.
* There are more pieces of wood on the floor by the dresser/ I don't know what I was thinking...
* 4 or 5 Weapon racks.
---------------------
Future Updates
** The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim: Hearthfire support. [Most likely]
** Hatch to underground? [Likely]
** Have the weapon rack ACTUALLY WORK! [Working on it]
** Market stall in front of your house or in the plains district. [Possible]
---------------------
Completed with:
*** Character Bedroom
*** Enchanter's Room
*** Housecarl's room
*** 2-3 bodyguards in your home along with their personal beds. (Moved from Future Updates)
*** Guard Dog with a personal resting station. (Moved from Future Updates)
---------------------
Working on:
**** Living room
**** Deck above the outside door (With ladder and a guard)
---------------------
Canceled Ideas:
***** 2-3 Whiterun Guards in your home instead of bodyguards. (Moved from Future Updates)
author: alex23323

Dramatically edited the default room
More food on the dinning room table
